name: Status Code 500 Invalid Header Value verification Collection Details
fullName: Regression_Testing/scenario_based/collection_details#Status Code 500 Invalid Header Value verification Collection Details
description:
The test on this request asserts that the reponse has a "200 OK" status.

You can check for any HTTP status code using the same mechanism, for example `pm.response.to.have.status(403)` if your API should return an "Unauthorized" response.
